thread.title: 25 tweets about getting old that remind us of our inevitable fate (28 Photos)
thread.title_full: 25 tweets about getting old that remind us of our inevitable fate (28 Photos)

author: Shelbie
title: 25 tweets about getting old that remind us of our inevitable fate (28 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Life is great until we all realize we’re actually going to have to go through that whole growing old thing, it’s not just something that happens to our parents. Just like that, our good times are forever clouded with the fact that our knees, backs and sex drives just aren’t what they used to be and the “slow” march towards the golden years turns into a relay race. 
Luckily we can all laugh about it, because what else are we gonna do? 2
